title: SoFi Technologies, AMC, Salesforce, Snowflake: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: SoFi Technologies lifted its earnings guidance; Snowflake results are due after the close
body:
Stock futures are up as the crisis in Ukraine continues to unfold (live coverage), with crude prices hovering near $110 a barrel. Here’s what we’re watching in Wednesday’s trading:
